languages.text: "Равор на вокс-линии, Лорд-капитан. Хорошо, что убираемся отсюда, а то с нижних палуб уже докладывают про песни сквозь переборки и сходящих с ума людей... только последнее: каковы распоряжения по части планеты?"

"Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"
languages.original_text: "Равор на вокс-линии, Лорд-капитан. Хорошо, что убираемся отсюда, а то с нижних палуб уже докладывают про песни сквозь переборки и сходящих с ума людей... только последнее: каковы распоряжения по части планеты?"

traits.locale_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

"Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

"Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

"Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

languages.text: “船长老大，我是雷沃。谢天谢地，终于要离开这个鬼地方了。我们已经收到底层甲板的报告了，说有的船舱出现了歌声，还有人发了疯之类的……现在只剩最后一件事情了：这颗行星该怎么处理？”
languages.original_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，我是雷沃。谢天谢地，终于要离开这个鬼地方了。我们已经收到底层甲板的报告了，说有的船舱出现了歌声，还有人发了疯之类的……现在只剩最后一件事情了：这颗行星该怎么处理？”

languages.text: «Aquí Ravor por voco, Lord Capi. Menos mal que nos vamos ya de aquí; nos están llegando informes de las cubiertas inferiores sobre cánticos a través de las mamparas, gente que se vuelve loca y demás... Solo queda una última cosa: ¿qué hacemos con el planeta?».
languages.original_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

traits.locale_text: «Aquí Ravor por voco, Lord Capi. Menos mal que nos vamos ya de aquí; nos están llegando informes de las cubiertas inferiores sobre cánticos a través de las mamparas, gente que se vuelve loca y demás... Solo queda una última cosa: ¿qué hacemos con el planeta?».

languages.text: 「こちらはラヴォアです、ロード・キャプテン。ここから脱出することができて良かったです。なにせ、下層デッキからは既にさまざまな報告を受けているものですから。隔壁から歌声が聞こえてきたり、狂ったりしてる人もいるようです。最後に1つだけ、この星をどうなさるのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

traits.locale_text: 「こちらはラヴォアです、ロード・キャプテン。ここから脱出することができて良かったです。なにせ、下層デッキからは既にさまざまな報告を受けているものですから。隔壁から歌声が聞こえてきたり、狂ったりしてる人もいるようです。最後に1つだけ、この星をどうなさるのですか？」

languages.text: « Ici Ravor, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Heureusement qu'on met les voiles, parce qu'on commence déjà à recevoir des rapports des ponts inférieurs : des chants qui viennent des cloisons, des gens qui perdent la boule, ce genre de trucs... Juste une dernière chose : qu'est-ce qu'on fait de cette planète ? »
languages.original_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

traits.locale_text: « Ici Ravor, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Heureusement qu'on met les voiles, parce qu'on commence déjà à recevoir des rapports des ponts inférieurs : des chants qui viennent des cloisons, des gens qui perdent la boule, ce genre de trucs... Juste une dernière chose : qu'est-ce qu'on fait de cette planète ? »

languages.text: "Hier spricht Ravor auf der Vox-Leitung, Lord Cap'n. Es ist gut, dass wir von hier wegkommen – die unteren Decks melden bereits Gesänge durch die Schotten, Leute werden wahnsinnig und so weiter ... Ach, eines noch: Was soll mit dem Planeten geschehen?"
languages.original_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Hier spricht Ravor auf der Vox-Leitung, Lord Cap'n. Es ist gut, dass wir von hier wegkommen – die unteren Decks melden bereits Gesänge durch die Schotten, Leute werden wahnsinnig und so weiter ... Ach, eines noch: Was soll mit dem Planeten geschehen?"

languages.text: "Ben Ravor, voks hattındayım Lord Kaptan. Buradan gidiyor oluşumuz sevindirici. Alt güvertelerden raporlar almaya başladık bile: Bölme panellerinden şarkılar duyulmaya başlanmış, insanlar deliriyormuş. Yalnız bir şey daha var... Bu gezegene ne olacak?"
languages.original_text: "Ravor here on the vox-line, Lord Cap'n. Good thing we're getting out of here — we're already getting reports from the lower decks: singing coming through the bulkheads, people going insane, and the like... Just one last thing: what's to be done with the planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben Ravor, voks hattındayım Lord Kaptan. Buradan gidiyor oluşumuz sevindirici. Alt güvertelerden raporlar almaya başladık bile: Bölme panellerinden şarkılar duyulmaya başlanmış, insanlar delirmeye falan başlamış. Son bir şey daha: Bu gezegene ne olacak?"
